problem.markdown:
>> The Jidoka (Automation) means “The autonomous check of the abnormal in a process.” It includes mechanism to detect defects and mechanism to stop the line when defects are detected. It is a part of centralized management. << ( ) True. ( X ) False.
[explanation] The Jidoka (Automation) means “The autonomous check of the abnormal in a process.” It includes mechanism to detect defects and mechanism to stop the line when defects are detected. Autonomous means local: Local machine controls and local people stops the lines. It is not a part of centralizd management. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: The Jidoka (Automation) means “The autonomous check of the abnormal in a process.” It includes mechanism to detect defects and mechanism to stop the line when defects are detected. It is a part of centralized management.
